problem.markdown:
>> A stretched rubber band is an example of _______ energy. << () chemical () gravitational () hydroelectric () kinetic (x) potential
[explanation] Potential energy is energy that is stored but has not yet been released. [explanation]
problem.p: A stretched rubber band is an example of _______ energy.

choicegroup.label: A stretched rubber band is an example of _______ energy.

div.p: Potential energy is energy that is stored but has not yet been released.
